name: Re-FRACT Fractal Colouring Book
description:
Note: Currently available only on Windows at minimum 1080p.

Re-FRACT was designed to be an educational tool for generating hand-drawn fractal art, where whatever you draw is iterated through one of millions of fractal formulas to generate unique fractals  in real time. The pictures you'll draw are just as much pieces of art as they are complex, endlessly detailed and somewhat self-similar mathematical objects.

Relax and enjoy watching your drawings form beautiful fractals. When you like what you see, you can save your images too!
